title: Definitions
context: ยง354D-2 Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Able-bodied inmate&rdquo; means any person in the custody of the department of public safety who, as determined by the department, is physically and mentally able to participate in a work program or other training program authorized by this chapter. &ldquo;Administrator&rdquo; means the administrator of the correctional industries program. &ldquo;Advisory committee&rdquo; means the correctional industries advisory committee established in section 354D-5. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of public safety. &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means the director of public safety. [L 1990, c 341, pt of ยง1; am L 1992, c 36, ยง1]
